last_episode_to_air.name: Snowbody Loves Me
last_episode_to_air.overview: Todd can't keep up with the kids on the slopes while Nanny takes Chloe to find gold.

name: Chrisley Knows Best
overview: Follows Atlanta-based self-made multimillionaire Todd Chrisley, his devoted wife Julie and their five children who live a seemingly picture-perfect Southern life with everything money can buy.

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: Chrisley Knows Best is a real-life family comedy, which broke its ratings record on its second season premiere, follows the entertaining lives of Atlanta-based "Patriarch of Perfection" Todd Chrisley, and his colorful clan including his wife, five children and two grandchildren.

episodes.name: Patriarch of Perfection
episodes.overview: Meet the Chrisley family, where Todd Chrisley is king. He micromanages his family just like his business and always tries to stay five steps ahead of his 5 children.

episodes.name: Not So Sweet Sixteen
episodes.overview: Savannah is turning sweet 16, and a big birthday bash is in the works. Todd has to come to grips with the fact that his little girl is growing into a young woman.

episodes.name: Jugs and Ammo
episodes.overview: While Lindsie recovers from plastic surgery, Todd and Lindsie's husband, Will, make an effort to find some common ground at the most unexpected place - a shooting range.

episodes.name: Two Men and a Baby
episodes.overview: The Chrisleys welcome Kyle's daughter, Baby Chloe, who is coming to live with Todd and Julie while they teach Kyle "Parenting 101." Meanwhile, Savannah and Chase get into a fender bender.

episodes.name: Todd-tervention
episodes.overview: Todd takes Savannah and Chase to New York City to teach them more about the fashion business. Savannah is a perfect student, but Chase is only interested in the models and the nightlife.

episodes.name: Big Apple Blowup
episodes.overview: When an influential Southern magazine asks The Chrisleys for an interview about all things fashion, Todd insists on controlling the situation by writing a script for his family to memorize.

episodes.name: Date Night
episodes.overview: The Chrisley children treat Todd and Julie to a day of pampering and a romantic dinner. Unfortunately, Todd is in the middle of a business transaction that is taking up all his attention.

episodes.name: Hey Chloe, It's Your Birthday
episodes.overview: Todd bets Julie that he can throw just as fabulous of a birthday party for Chloe as she could. Julie agrees to the bet, but tells Todd that he has to do it all on his own.

episodes.name: Rules for Dating My Teenage Daughter
episodes.overview: When Julie decides to return to work, Todd must pick up the slack at home; Savannah wants to start dating a 19 year old musician.

episodes.name: Misadventures in Babysitting
episodes.overview: Todd and Julie leave Grayson in the care of Chase and Savannah when they go out of town for the night; Chase and Savannah have their own plans.

episodes.name: Father's Day
episodes.overview: The Chrisley's children want to plan the perfect day for Todd for Father's Day, but Todd's competitive nature threatens the fun.

episodes.name: Confessions of a Beauty Queen
episodes.overview: Todd and Julie decide it is time to downsize their house; the family is driven crazy by Todd's controlling ways; Savannah prepares for a Pageant.

episodes.name: Chase Turns 18
episodes.overview: When Chase celebrates his 18th birthday, and declares he will not follow house rules anymore, Todd shows him what it is like to be an adult.

episodes.name: Anger Management
episodes.overview: Todd learns that he has high blood pressure, and blames his family for the ailment; Todd must find a way to relieve stress.

episodes.name: California Chrisleys
episodes.overview: The family travels to Los Angeles for what Todd hopes is a relaxing family vacation; Savannah does something drastic; Faye disappears.

episodes.name: Workin' for a Livin'
episodes.overview: After paying for their extravagant launch, Todd wants Savannah and Chase to get summer jobs to learn the value of money.

episodes.name: The Great Outdoors
episodes.overview: Todd, Chase and Grayson go camping in a luxury RV; Savannah and Julie relearn the basics at driving school.

episodes.name: Marriage Redux
episodes.overview: Todd and Julie want to avoid a marriage rut when the kids go to college, so they look for new ways to reconnect and put the spark back in their relationship. Todd and Julie want to avoid a marriage rut when the kids go to college, so they look for new ways to reconnect and put the spark back in their relationship. Todd and Julie want to avoid a marriage rut when the kids go to college, so they look for new ways to reconnect and put the spark back in their relationship.

episodes.name: Houseguest from Hell
episodes.overview: When Julie's demanding pregnant friend visits, Todd's home life is disrupted; Todd reaches out to Lindsie.

episodes.name: Still Chrisley After All These Years
episodes.overview: Julie and Todd throw a charity event for breast cancer to celebrate their wedding anniversary; after a mix-up everyone must scramble.

episodes.name: A Very Chrisley Christmas
episodes.overview: Following last season's hit special, "A Very Chrisley Christmas," viewers will get another holiday delight as the Chrisley family welcomes you into their impeccably decorated winter wonderland home and prepares for Julie's delicious Christmas dinner. Over the course of the episode, they will reminisce over their favorite moments from the season, reliving their comical interactions and mishaps through a compilation of prior and never-before-seen clips.

episodes.name: Savannah's Big Id-ea
episodes.overview: The Chrisleys are interviewed for a magazine and Todd writes a script for his family to memorize; when things go off script, Todd retaliates with some honesty.

episodes.name: Life's a Pitch
episodes.overview: Todd tries to help out and coach Grayson's baseball team but discovers he's in over his head and struggles to gain control of overzealous nine year olds.

episodes.name: Getting Testy
episodes.overview: When Savannah wants to go to college a year early, Todd wages a family competition to keep her home as long as possible; Chase pays the price when Todd is his ACT coach.

episodes.name: My Chrisley Valentine
episodes.overview: Todd recruits Savannah to help teach Chase a lesson after learning he is dating several different girls on Valentine's Day; Chase is left the victim of a Catfish prank only Toddy Chrisley could dream up.

episodes.name: Dollars and Sense
episodes.overview: Todd puts Savannah on a realistic budget to help prepare her for the real world, but when she is fired from two jobs she must dig deep to make her money back.

episodes.name: Chrisley's on Campus
episodes.overview: A road trip to Nashville to tour a college campus; Todd is excited for family bonding time, but Savannah has plans of her own.

episodes.name: Nurse Todd
episodes.overview: Todd's feelings are hurt when no one needs his help, until Savannah gets appendicitis; Savannah decides to milk it and becomes the patient from hell.

episodes.name: College Bootcamp
episodes.overview: Todd and Julie realize they have sheltered their children after Chase pays a stranger to change his flat tire, so they put them through a real-life boot camp to teach them the basics of life.

episodes.name: Rules of Engagement
episodes.overview: When Todd learns that Savannah is keeping her new boyfriend from the family, he goes to extreme lengths to get a glimpse of the new guy.

episodes.name: Failure to Launch
episodes.overview: Julie is eager to start a food blog, but when no one likes her page, she and Todd go on a food journey.

episodes.name: Mid-Life Chrisley
episodes.overview: With his birthday approaching, Todd begins to obsess about his age, but Mama Faye and her friends try to help him be more accepting; the children plan a surprise party.

episodes.name: Dude Ranch
episodes.overview: Grayson persuades his family to stay overnight at a working dude ranch for his birthday, thereby testing the family's ability to be "country."

episodes.name: Chrisley's Take London
episodes.overview: Chase and Savannah are excited to travel to London, however Todd does not share the sentiment; the family tries to break free of Todd's control.

episodes.name: Lord Chrisley
episodes.overview: When Todd takes his family to the English countryside, he insists on turning the Chrisleys into a proper English family but when the family resists, Todd goes to great lengths to prove he's a royal.

episodes.name: Love and Marriage
episodes.overview: Todd and Julie prepare to make an anniversary video, but when cracks in the marriage appear, they set out to reinvent themselves.

episodes.name: Sports Day
episodes.overview: Every summer the Chrisleys attend a family friend's annual Sports Day BBQ, and every year they are put to shame. Determined to break their losing streak, Todd's competitive spirit pushes his family to their breaking points.

episodes.name: Hometown Hero
episodes.overview: The Chrisleys head to their South Carolina lake house, which also happens to be in the town where Todd grew up. Todd decides the kids are in need of a family history lesson -but when Todd reunites with some of his childhood friends, the lesson turns out to be more than he bargained for, and the Chrisley kids learn some useful dirt on their dad.

episodes.name: The Graduates
episodes.overview: Chase and Savannah have just graduated high school and a celebration is already in the works. As spirits run high, Todd plans on surprising Savannah by inviting her boyfriend Blaire to perform; there's just one problem, Savannah has decided to take a break from Blaire which inadvertently threatens Todd's big plans.

episodes.name: A Very Chrisley Christmas 2
episodes.overview: The Chrisley family welcomes viewers into their home while they reminisce about their favorite moments of the season.

episodes.name: Leaving the Nest
episodes.overview: Todd drops Savannah off at college in Nashville, but in typical Todd fashion, finds a way to keep tabs on her. Meanwhile, Chase has his own scheme to capitalize on Savannah's new home.

episodes.name: Crowning Achievements
episodes.overview: Feeling disappointed for missing Savannah being crowned Miss Tennessee Teen USA, Todd plans a party; tension builds.

episodes.name: The Wrath of Todd
episodes.overview: Chase gets a tattoo of a Bible verse; Todd encourages Chase to have the tattoo removed; Savannah is failing her college Bible class.

episodes.name: Todd Unleashed
episodes.overview: On her return home, Savannah brings along her new puppy, which makes Todd angry; Chase tries to bond with his father.

episodes.name: Lights, Camera, Chase
episodes.overview: Chase lands an internship at a local television station, and must deal with difficult talent; Faye and Julie learn Italian.

episodes.name: Runaway Faye
episodes.overview: Todd learns that Faye has injured her foot on a gambling adventure, and insists she recover at his house; Julie urges Grayson to take piano lessons.

episodes.name: Moving On
episodes.overview: Savannah organizes a farewell weekend for Grayson and his friends in order to cheer him up; Chase teams up with his best friend in a scheme.

episodes.name: Too Close for Comfort
episodes.overview: The family settles into their new Nashville home; Todd encroaches on Savannah's independence; Grayson takes up wrestling.

episodes.name: Smoothie Operator
episodes.overview: The family prepares for the juice bar's grand opening; Chase fools around on the job; Faye tries to collect on a bet.

episodes.name: Chase in Charge
episodes.overview: Todd and Julie travel to Los Angeles for a liposuction procedure, leaving Chase in charge; Chase abuses his authority.

episodes.name: Family Matters
episodes.overview: Todd takes the juice bar employees on a team-building exercise; Savannah and Chase have a disagreement; Faye faces a health scare.

episodes.name: Goat Farm Yourself
episodes.overview: Todd wants Chase and Savannah to learn the value of hard work, so he sends them to a goat farm; the siblings bicker.

episodes.name: Todd Goes Country
episodes.overview: Todd works on a special song for Julies's birthday; Todd tricks Julie into planning her own surprise party; Todd must ask Savannah for help.

episodes.name: Hawaii Love You So
episodes.overview: Todd brings the family along on his and Julie's anniversary trip to Hawaii; Savannah and Lindsie must watch Nanny Faye.

episodes.name: Don't Kale Yourself
episodes.overview: Lindsie challenges Todd and Julie to change their unhealthy habits. When Chase gets his wisdom teeth removed, Todd takes advantage of his altered state of mind.

episodes.name: Todd's Not Dead
episodes.overview: Todd faces his mortality by forcing the family to plan his funeral; Savannah must work in a dog shelter after shirking her pageant queen duties.

episodes.name: Colon All Cards
episodes.overview: Todd schedules Julie's colonoscopy; and she forces him to get one, too. In other events, Faye's gambling gets out of hand and Lindsie takes drastic measures to get her to quit.

episodes.name: You Can't Handle the Truce
episodes.overview: Julie and Lindsie want Todd to bury the hatchet with son-in-law Will, whom he hasn't spoken to in two years; Grayson asks Savannah for dating advice when he has his first crush.

episodes.name: Review and Renew
episodes.overview: Todd and the kids appear in a commercial, but problems arise when Todd makes himself the director; Julie and her friend Lea investigate vaginal rejuvenation.

episodes.name: Go Flip Yourself
episodes.overview: Chase and Parker take on a house-flipping project, but things don't go according to plan; Julie spends time with Savannah when Todd's friend and prankster-in-crime, Bill, visits.

episodes.name: Message in a Bottle Rocket
episodes.overview: Todd takes the family to a rustic resort for the Fourth of July, but becomes upset when his outdoor skills are mocked; Chase and Parker become the course of major fireworks.

episodes.name: Crowning Around
episodes.overview: The family visits Las Vegas to support Savannah in the Miss Teen USA Beauty Pageant; Chase is left to keep tabs on Nanny Faye.

episodes.name: Pretty in Print
episodes.overview: Todd and Savannah are both chosen to be part of a magazine's "25 Most Beautiful People of Nashville" issue; Julie helps Chase prepare for his real estate exam.

episodes.name: Truth or Chair
episodes.overview: Todd moved his mother to Nashville, but her belongings take over his pristine home; Chase insists that his dad take a lie detector test after he catches wind of his father's penchant for lying.

episodes.name: Rent Controlled
episodes.overview: Todd offers to help Savannah, who wants to buy a home, but she realizes that there are too many strings attached; Grayson's monthly phone bill gets him in hot water with Todd.

episodes.name: The House That Todd Built
episodes.overview: Todd signs the family up with a local charity in order to teach the kids about giving back to the community; Grayson's school project causes a rift between Todd and Faye over their heritage.

episodes.name: A Very Grisly Chrisley
episodes.overview: The Chrisley's enter a Halloween-decorating contest; Lindsie tells the family about her relationship with Will.

episodes.name: 50 Shades of Faye
episodes.overview: Nanny Faye joins the world of online dating, but when Todd gets wind of it he makes himself her chaperone. New homeowners Chase and Savannah compete for Todd's handouts to furnish their homes.

episodes.name: Client-Hell
episodes.overview: Savannah agrees to manage Todd's singing career for a school project and unwittingly unleashes his inner diva. Chase struggles to throw a dinner for the family to prove he can out do Savannah.

episodes.name: Bunions, Bulldogs and Hedgehogs, Oh My!
episodes.overview: Todd thinks taking over Julie's housework while she recovers from surgery will be a cakewalk, but running the home isn't as easy as it looks. And Chase schemes with Nanny Faye to get Todd to accept his dog, Lilo.

episodes.name: Market Crash
episodes.overview: Chase accepts Todd's challenge to market the juice bar, but quickly realizes that selling juice is hard; Todd and Julie fret about Savannah, who's convalescing at the family home after a bad car wreck.

episodes.name: Mannequin Challenge
episodes.overview: It's all hands on deck when Savannah struggles with a project for her clothing line. And after receiving an ultimatum from Todd, Chase will try anything to get his dog Lilo's behavior under control.

episodes.name: O Grayson, Where Art Thou?
episodes.overview: Todd and Julie's hope for a relaxing weekend together proves to be wishful thinking; and when Chase has Grayson over for some brotherly bonding, the bonding goes out the window

episodes.name: Matchmakers and Batchbakers
episodes.overview: After a recent break-up, Savannah decides she's ready to date again and Todd and Julie compete to find her perfect match. Grayson enters a creative cookie contest.

episodes.name: Dancing Tween
episodes.overview: Todd and Julie are at odds about Grayson growing up after he gets invited to his first tween dance; Savannah's new ride causes Todd to test her and Nanny Faye's driving skills.

episodes.name: Moms Just Wanna Have Fun
episodes.overview: Todd refuses to celebrate anyone but Faye for Mother's Day; Julie and Lindsie make their own plans; Todd must babysit Jackson.

episodes.name: Twisted Sisters
episodes.overview: Todd offers to chauffeur Faye and her sister around; Julie opens a boutique real estate office, and offers to sell Savannah's house.

episodes.name: Remission Control
episodes.overview: The Chrisleys have a family bowling tournament; Julie waits to hear if her cancer is in remission; the family plans a surprise.

episodes.name: Differing Strokes
episodes.overview: Todd and Chase team up for a golf match against Jay Demarcus; Savannah tries to move in with Nanny Faye.

episodes.name: Runaways and Segways
episodes.overview: Todd and Savannah disagree about planning a charity fashion show; Chase helps Nanny Faye apply for a job.

episodes.name: Boys to men
episodes.overview: Todd highjacks Chase's 21st birthday plans and forces some father/son bonding time on him. Meanwhile, Julie tries to get Grayson ready for football tryouts but knows nothing about football.

episodes.name: Animal House
episodes.overview: Todd gets more than he bargained for when he offers to watch a house full of children. And Julie struggles to let her hair down on a girls' weekend.

episodes.name: Tantrums and Tiaras
episodes.overview: Grayson's dream to visit Universal Orlando's Volcano Bay is in jeopardy when his parents' work gets in the way.

episodes.name: Quit your Pitchin
episodes.overview: Todd attempts to train Savannah for a charity softball game despite not knowing how to play himself. And when Todd neglects to help Grayson train his new puppy he gets on Julie's bad side.

episodes.name: Baking Bad
episodes.overview: Julie and Faye battle over who will host Thanksgiving dinner; Todd tries to find a cure for his insomnia.

episodes.name: Bringing Up Baby
episodes.overview: Chase and Savannah get more than they bargain for when they give Todd and Julie the weekend off parental duties. With their free time, Todd and Julie rekindle their romance.

episodes.name: Ready to Launch
episodes.overview: The Chrisleys head to Tampa for Savannah's fashion line launch at HSN. Todd and Julie help Savannah overcome her on air jitters, and Nanny gets Chase in trouble at a casino.

episodes.name: A Play in a Manger
episodes.overview: Todd & Julie direct the community nativity play while also trying to teach Chloe and Grayson the true meaning of Christmas.

episodes.name: The Nightmare Before Chrisley
episodes.overview: Overwhelmed with all the guests visiting for the weekend, Todd has difficulty getting into the Christmas spirit.

episodes.name: Training Faye
episodes.overview: Julie gets annoyed when Chloe's fifth birthday brings out her family's competitive side. Meanwhile, Todd's meddling in Faye's exercise routine gets her blood pressure up.

episodes.name: Todd and Pony Show
episodes.overview: Todd becomes Faye's assistant after finding out that she's been making Julie to run all of her errands. Meanwhile, Savannah gets over-excited when Chloe shows an interest in horseback riding.

episodes.name: A Date With Destiny
episodes.overview: A newly single Chase gets caught off guard when his family sets him up on a double blind date. Meanwhile, Todd struggles with how to handle Grayson's latest homework assignment.

episodes.name: Biddy Battle
episodes.overview: Todd finds himself in the middle of an old biddy battle when Frances moves in with Faye. And Grayson attempts to break a world record.

episodes.name: Painted Into A Corner
episodes.overview: Todd stresses out Julie when he insists on investing in an oil painting of the family. And after a kitchen fire, Grayson decides the Chrisleys need some emergency response training.

episodes.name: Top Dog
episodes.overview: Todds opinion embarrasses Julie when she offers to organize a childrens art fair. Meanwhile, the race is on for top dog when Faye and Grayson enter their pups into a pageant.

episodes.name: Celebrating a Chrisley Century
episodes.overview: To celebrate 100 episodes of Chrisley Knows Best, the family takes a look back on all the greatest, most meaningful and overly ridiculous moments from the show.

episodes.name: Panic At the Pageant
episodes.overview: Todd takes on too much as the family heads to Florida to run their first Miss Florida USA pageant. And when Faye makes a rash purchase, Todd insists on calling her out.

episodes.name: No Men for Old Country
episodes.overview: Todds manhood gets called into question during a vacation with family and friends. Meanwhile, Chase has to make amends with Chloe after they get into a fight.

episodes.name: Baking Up Is Hard to Do
episodes.overview: Todd attempts to be supportive when Julie prepares desserts for a restaurant grand opening; Chase tries to get back in Savannah's good graces as she deals with insecurities.

episodes.name: Running Gout of Time
episodes.overview: Julie questions her decision to let Chase help her and Allison train for a 5K. And when Todd is diagnosed with gout, he struggles to understand why his family has no sympathy.

episodes.name: Ride or Die
episodes.overview: When Julies stress reaches a breaking point, Todd comes up with a plan to alleviate it. Chase helps Nanny learn to ride a bike.

episodes.name: Going for Broker
episodes.overview: After Todd signs a development deal, he fuels a competition between Julie, Chase and Savannah to be the listing agent. Meanwhile, Grayson decides to help Todd get over his fear of snakes.

episodes.name: America's Next Todd Model
episodes.overview: Faye takes the law into her own hands when the neighborhood kids annoy her; Todd gets a second shot at becoming a male model.

episodes.name: Say It Dont Spray It
episodes.overview: Todd clashes with Chase when he finds out Chase got back together with his ex-girlfriend. And Savannah tests out her spray tanning skills on Nanny Faye.

episodes.name: Emotionally In-Vested
episodes.overview: When Nanny frets about leaving Miley behind to go out of town, Chase comes up with an idea to help out; Todd lands himself in trouble on a date with Julie.

episodes.name: White Nannies Can't Jump
episodes.overview: Todd and Julie's podcasting career almost ends before it starts when Todd goes overboard with preparation; Nanny Faye joins a senior basketball league.

episodes.name: Restaurant Impossible
episodes.overview: Chase decides to start his own candle business; Julie finds that her dream of opening up her own restaurant clashes with Todd's vision.

episodes.name: Spoiled Sports
episodes.overview: Todd gets roped into a boys trip to Universal Orlando for Grayson's birthday; Julie teaches Chloe a lesson in sportsmanship before her first horse riding competition.

episodes.name: The Perfect Equation
episodes.overview: When Savannah brings home her new boyfriend, Todd takes the opportunity to test his intentions; Chase and Savannah step up and help when Grayson struggles with a math test.

episodes.name: Lord of the Earrings
episodes.overview: Todd tries to teach Julie a lesson about keeping track of her jewelry after she loses another expensive piece; Nanny Faye enlists Chase's help for a neighborhood porch competition.

episodes.name: Diplomatic Immunity
episodes.overview: Due to a work commitment, Julie must miss Chloe's pre-K graduation while Todd takes over her duties; Savannah tries to prove to Todd she's ready for a new job in California.

episodes.name: Towing the Line
episodes.overview: Chase takes advantage of his dad's car when Savannah signs them up to baby-sit over Father's Day; Grayson has trouble getting along with Savannah's boyfriend, Nic.

6.name: Season 6
6.overview: Chrisley Knows Best is a real-life family comedy, which broke its ratings record on its second season premiere, follows the entertaining lives of Atlanta-based "Patriarch of Perfection" Todd Chrisley, and his colorful clan including his wife, five children and two grandchildren.

episodes.name: Man-o-pause
episodes.overview: Todd receives an alarming diagnosis; Grayson's broken phone fixes his money problems.

episodes.name: Rugrats
episodes.overview: Julie forces Todd to host Chloe's first slumber party; Faye smells a rat.

episodes.name: Faye Talk Pretty One Day
episodes.overview: Faye tries to fix her diction. Todd is out of sync with Chloe's school dance.

episodes.name: Different Strokes
episodes.overview: Todd has trouble getting Grayson to reveal a secret. Chase helps Faye learn to swim.

episodes.name: Todd Man Out
episodes.overview: Todd is jealous of Savannah's new BFF Chadd. Chloe talks Todd into buying her a fish.

episodes.name: Down on the Farm
episodes.overview: Faye bets Chase & Gray can't live like she did. Savannah gets to be the boss of Todd.

episodes.name: Wire, Wire, Pants on Fire
episodes.overview: Todd and Julie struggle with lying to Grayson. Chase applies to join a country club.

episodes.name: Faye's Got Talent
episodes.overview: Faye enters a talent competition; Savannah tries to learn French for her boyfriend.

episodes.name: Good Faye Hunting
episodes.overview: Faye and Chase hunt for the perfect Thanksgiving; Grayson tries out for the debate team.

episodes.name: What Not to Swear
episodes.overview: Chase and Faye don't want to play ball with Todd. Chloe's swearing causes family drama.

episodes.name: Young St. Nic
episodes.overview: Savannah's boyfriend has a proposal. Tempers escalate when the family borrows Julie's car.

episodes.name: Kick the Bucket
episodes.overview: Faye's birthday bucket list worries Todd. Tood & Chase take rival Chloe school photos.

episodes.name: Pipe Dreams
episodes.overview: Faye overstays her welcome after her house floods. Chase flirts with disaster when helping Savannah.

episodes.name: You Can't Handle the Tooth!
episodes.overview: Todd is the judge in a Julie-Faye feud. Chloe gets a visit from the tooth fairy.

episodes.name: Tattoo You
episodes.overview: Faye gets a tattoo to spite Todd. Julie's competitive spirit shows when she enters a chili cook-off

episodes.name: Are You There Todd? Its Me Grayson
episodes.overview: Faye preps for doomsday. The family wrestles with Graysons impending puberty.

episodes.name: Driving Ms. Faye
episodes.overview: Nanny studies for an important DMV test, and Todd schemes to get Chloe into an elite new school.

episodes.name: Chickening Out
episodes.overview: Todd confronts his claustrophobia; Nanny gets busted with pet chickens.

episodes.name: Bummer Camp
episodes.overview: Todd almost ruins Chloe's first camping trip; Faye and Chase raise cash for a dog charity.

episodes.name: Mid Summer Night's Faye
episodes.overview: Todd coaches Faye in an amateur play; Nic and Chase try to surprise Savannah for her birthday.

episodes.name: Retail Therapy
episodes.overview: Fayes doting over Todd becomes a problem. Savannah misses playing football and joins a team.

episodes.name: Something Old Something Nude
episodes.overview: Savannah is caught between Nic and Todd when wedding planning. Faye reconnects with an old friend.

episodes.name: Vote for Chrisley
episodes.overview: Faye launches a campaign to legalize gambling. Todd struggles with Chloes new imaginary friend.

episodes.name: Fish Guts and Glory
episodes.overview: Savannah learns a lesson when she meddles in Nics career. Nanny takes Grayson and Chase fishing.

episodes.name: Beanbags & Bullies
episodes.overview: Chloe has a hair-raising experience at school, Nanny enters a corn hole competition for seniors.

episodes.name: Three Men and a Chloe
episodes.overview: While Chase plays babysitter back at home, Todd shares a hotel room with Nic in an effort to bond.

episodes.name: Grandma Theft Auto
episodes.overview: Savannah deals with a big secret and Todd teaches Faye a lesson when she asks him to buy her a new car.

episodes.name: Badminton to the Bone
episodes.overview: Todd is jealous of Julie's badminton instructor; Grayson sneaks out to go to an unsupervised party.

episodes.name: Roller Skates and Senior Dates
episodes.overview: Savannah tries to teach Chloe how to roller skate; Faye and Chase help Frances find a man.

episodes.name: Bother-in-Law
episodes.overview: Todd clashes with his father-in-law over plans for Julie's birthday. Faye gives Chloe a cell phone.

episodes.name: Wrong Side of 40
episodes.overview: Julie gets a makeover to feel young again. Nanny's new CB radio relationship makes Todd uncomfortable.

episodes.name: Everlasting Todd
episodes.overview: Todd fixates on living forever while Chase and Savannah scheme to get Chloe a pet for her birthday.

episodes.name: Let's Talk About Sex, Grayson
episodes.overview: Grayson's odd behavior sends Julie spinning. Meanwhile, Nanny gets involved in a pyramid scheme.

episodes.name: Snitchy Bitchy
episodes.overview: Todd gets excited by Nic and Savannah hanging out. Chase helps Nanny to decorate her golf cart.

episodes.name: Faye's Pig Adventure
episodes.overview: Todd decides to bring down the neighborhood drug dealer while Faye goes into the truffle business.

episodes.name: We Be Jammin'
episodes.overview: The kids get creative with their Father's Day gift for Todd. Faye teaches Grayson to make jam.

episodes.name: Mrs. Doubt Hire
episodes.overview: Todd and Julie hire a nanny; Faye and Grayson bet on baseball games together.

episodes.name: Build a Baby
episodes.overview: Todd is way too involved in both Savannahs decision to freeze her eggs and Chloes school project.

episodes.name: Chrisley Knows Pest
episodes.overview: Chase is uncomfortable when Todd hires Elliott as an assistant, and Faye crusades against critters.

episodes.name: Odd Savannah Out
episodes.overview: Grayson grapples with being the perfect son; Savannah feels left out of the Chase & Nanny Faye duo.

episodes.name: Grays of Thunder
episodes.overview: Todd and Grayson try to build a soap box derby car while a new wig changes Faye's outlook on life.

episodes.name: Selling Todd
episodes.overview: Grayson gets his own social media account; Todd discovers a life-changing letter from the past.

episodes.name: The Young and the Restless
episodes.overview: Todd tries to prove to Julie he's still got what it takes; Chloe develops a fear of monsters.

episodes.name: The Botox Monster
episodes.overview: Chase gets competitive with his taller, little brother. Chloe paints Todd as the Botox Monster.

episodes.name: Snore Wars
episodes.overview: Julie's snoring gets under Todd's skin. Faye gets into a turf war with a rival delivery business.

episodes.name: The Grudge Match
episodes.overview: Faye confesses to a 25 year grudge match against Julie's Dad. Todd bribes Chloe for intel.

episodes.name: Quitters Never Win
episodes.overview: Todd and Julie must teach Chloe not to be a quitter; Chase can't remember his anniversary.

episodes.name: Home Sweet Chrome
episodes.overview: Savannah's plans for her new house send Todd reeling; Todd goes overboard with Grayson's new truck.

episodes.name: Madam Faye
episodes.overview: Savannah pushes back on Todd's all work, no play attitude; Faye leans into her psychic abilities.

episodes.name: Blind-Sighted
episodes.overview: Todd and Julie struggle to be spontaneous in their marriage; Chase is sick of Todd's mean jokes.

episodes.name: Players and Party Planners
episodes.overview: Todd gets left out of Jay's birthday planning; Grayson gets tripped up trying to be a player.

episodes.name: Egged On
episodes.overview: Todd is pressured to make new friends, while Chloe is given the wrong meaning of Easter.

episodes.name: A Brand New Todd
episodes.overview: Todd struggles as the brand ambassador for a new mocktail line; Grayson gets busted playing hooky.

episodes.name: Age Against the Machine
episodes.overview: The kids throw a wrench in Todd's big anniversary plans; Faye battles ageism at a coffee shop.

episodes.name: Best in Shoe
episodes.overview: Todd rigs a bachelor auction, while Grayson's sneaker business gets a surprising boost in sales.

episodes.name: Monkey Wrench
episodes.overview: A broken foot derails Chase's surprise birthday party; Nanny fears that Grayson has outgrown her.

episodes.name: The Fast And The Spurious
episodes.overview: Todd is a spoilsport when he is forced to go to NASCAR; Julia obsesses over her perfect mom image.

episodes.name: It's Your Lucky Faye
episodes.overview: Julie gets revenge when Todd steals her vacation surprise; Faye schools Chase on how to be lucky.

episodes.name: See Ya Later, Alligator
episodes.overview: Chloe feels left out during the family vacation; Faye's dream to hunt an alligator gets shut down.

episodes.name: Welcome To The Dog House
episodes.overview: Todd pays the price for being a rude houseguest; Savannah teaches Grayson a lesson in respect.

episodes.name: Catcher If You Can
episodes.overview: Faye goes rogue when volunteering at the zoo; Chase realizes his baseball glory days are over.

episodes.name: A Very Chrisley Fixmas
episodes.overview: This Christmas, the Chrisley's need a miracle when Todd's behavior threatens to ruin the big day.

episodes.name: No Basic B*tch
episodes.overview: Todd offends Faye during a gardening contest; Chase plays grill master for the 4th of July BBQ.

episodes.name: Switchin It Up
episodes.overview: Todd and Faye accidentally wind up at a swinger's party while the kids seek adventure of their own.

episodes.name: Eye On The Prize
episodes.overview: Todd gets green-eyed when Julie hires a hot handyman. Chase helps Nanny level up her birding game.

episodes.name: Playing Favorites
episodes.overview: Todd gets pranked when he overuses the term "favorite child"; Nanny refuses treatment for her knee.

episodes.name: Love Thy Neighbor
episodes.overview: Todd hatches a plan to stop his in-laws from moving in; Savannah's housewarming party offends Todd.

episodes.name: Cut Throat Chrisleys
episodes.overview: Julie's competitiveness alienates the family; Nanny's lederhosen business cuts corners.

episodes.name: Prank You Very Much
episodes.overview: Todd wants revenge on Chase for a viral prank. Savannah helps Faye immortalize her life story.

episodes.name: Renovation Frustration (1)
episodes.overview: Todd's drastic home renovation drives Julie away. Faye boosts morale at work with cow patty bingo.

episodes.name: Renovation Frustration (2)
episodes.overview: Julie demands Todd make progress on the new house while she's away for her birthday weekend.

episodes.name: Social Disorder
episodes.overview: Todd and Julie learn about dating in the digital age. Faye finds an outlet for her road rage.

episodes.name: Mind Your Business
episodes.overview: Todd doesn't want to share his new classic convertible with Harvey. Chase takes a swing at a golf business.

episodes.name: Trolled You So
episodes.overview: Julie is rocked when her cookbook is criticized. Nanny's convinced trolls live in the forest.

episodes.name: Attitude Intervention
episodes.overview: Chase fears Todd is too mean to join his golf mixer. Savannah stresses about her life timeline.

episodes.name: Faycation (All I Ever Wanted)
episodes.overview: Chase and Savannah ditch Nanny Faye on vacation. Todd and Julie remind Grayson he is still a kid.

episodes.name: Snowbody Loves Me
episodes.overview: Todd can't keep up with the kids on the slopes while Nanny takes Chloe to find gold.
